async cleanupOldPhotos(){let daysOld=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:30;try{if(!this.db){await this.initDB();}const cutoffDate=new Date();cutoffDate.setDate(cutoffDate.getDate()-daysOld);const photos=await this.db.getAll(STORE_NAME);const photosToDelete=photos.filter(photo=>{const photoDate=new Date(photo.createdAt);return photoDate<cutoffDate&&photo.status==="uploaded";});for(const photo of photosToDelete){await this.db.delete(STORE_NAME,photo.id);}return photosToDelete.length;}catch(error){console.error("ÐžÑˆÐ¸Ð±ÐºÐ° Ð¾Ñ‡Ð¸ÑÑ‚ÐºÐ¸ ÑÑ‚Ð°Ñ€Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ„Ð¾Ñ‚Ð¾Ð³Ñ€Ð°Ñ„Ð¸Ð¹:",error);return 0;}}}export const photoService=new PhotoService();export{PhotoService};
